price: 3. rends gloire alors à ton Seigneur, célèbre Ses louanges et implore Son pardon ! Car Il est Tout Absoluteur !
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wa-is'taghfir'hu innahu kāna tawwāban
